<script type='text/javascript'>
(function() {
var idz = document.createElement('script'); idz.type = 'text/javascript'; idz.async = true;
idz.src = document.location.protocol + '/' + '/' + 'halc.iadvize.com/iadvize.js?sid=null&lang=en_US';
var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(idz, s);
})();
var device = 'Desktop';
     if (navigator.userAgent.match(/(android|iphone|ipad|blackberry|symbian|symbianos|symbos|netfront|model-orange|javaplatform|iemobile|windows phone|samsung|htc|opera mobile|opera mobi|opera mini|presto|huawei|blazer|bolt|doris|fennec|gobrowser|iris|maemo browser|mib|cldc|minimo|semc-browser|skyfire|teashark|teleca|uzard|uzardweb|meego|nokia|bb10|playbook)/gi)) {
         if ( ((screen.width  >= 480) && (screen.height >= 800)) || ((screen.width  >= 800) && (screen.height >= 480)) || navigator.userAgent.match(/ipad/gi) ) {
            device = 'Tablet';
         } else {
         device = 'Mobile';
         }
      } else {
      device = 'Desktop';
      }
      var idzCustomData = {
      "page_type": device
      };
</script>
<!-- END IADVIZE CHAT -->

	

<script type="text/javascript" src="//display.ugc.bazaarvoice.com/static/lacoste-en_us/Main%20Site/en_US/bvapi.js"></script>

<script type="text/javascript" language="javascript">
	var configData = {};
	
    	configData.productId = "30SPI3001";
    	  configData.events = {
          	    bvRender: function(data) {
          	        if (!data.TotalReviewCount || data.TotalReviewCount === 0 || data.TotalReviewCount === 'undefined')      
          	        {	        	
    					$("#BVRRContainer").hide();
	 	        	    $(".bv-stars-container").remove();
	 	        	    $('.bazaarvoicetitle').hide();
          	        }
          	        else
          	        {     
          	        	if($('.hiddentitle').length == 0)
          	        	{
  	        	     		$('.bazaarvoicetitle').html($('.bazaarvoicetitle').html() + '<span class="hiddentitle">(' + data.TotalReviewCount + ')</span>');
          	        	}
          	       	}
          	    }
          	};
    	
    $BV.configure("global", configData);
</script>

<li>

<a href="/us/lacoste/men/clothing/" style="color:#454545;" class="title-15">
Clothing
</a>
<ul>

<div class="menu-stories">
<ul>


<li>



<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/">

	 

	
</a>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/" style="color:#454545;" class="title-15">
Men's sale
</a>
<ul>






<li>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/polos-1/" >Polos</a>

</li>










<li>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/tees-1/" >Tees</a>

</li>










<li>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/woven-shirts-1/" >Woven Shirts</a>

</li>










<li>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/jackets-coats-1/" >Jackets &amp; Coats</a>

</li>












<li>
<a href="/us/lacoste/sale/men-s-sale/sweaters-sweatshirts-1/" >Sweaters &amp; Sweatshirts</a>

</li>

<div class="dialog dialog-holder accordion-desktop-only data-dialog-drop-menu" data-accordion-menu-id="dialog-menu-Polo" data-accordion-menu-group="menu-collapse">

	 


	




<div class="dialog-banner-top content-asset"><!-- dwMarker="content" dwContentID="bdV7EiaaixJlcaaadnd7ANKdbW" -->

<div class="banner-description">

<span class="title-40">the iconic polo</span>


<p>ONE TIMELESS CLASSIC, COUNTLESS DIFFERENT EXPRESSIONS.<br />
THE LACOSTE POLO, DESIGNED AND REINVENTED FOR THOSE WHO LIVE THEIR LIFE AS A BEAUTIFUL SPORT.<br />
<a href="http://www.lacoste.com/us/lacoste/men/clothing/polos/">Shop All Men's Polos</a><br>

<a href="http://www.lacoste.com/us/polo-shop.html">Enter the Polo Shop</a></p>

</div>
<div class="banner-image">

<span data-picture data-alt="Lacoste">

<span data-src="http://staticna1.lacoste.com/aaup_prd/on/demandware.static/-/Library-Sites-LacosteNAContent/default/dw873b74de/rich-menu/FW15/menu-rich-polos-banner.jpg" data-media="(min-width: 768px)"></span>

<span data-src="http://staticna1.lacoste.com/aaup_prd/on/demandware.static/-/Library-Sites-LacosteNAContent/default/dw873b74de/rich-menu/FW15/menu-rich-polos-banner.jpg" data-media="(min-width: 1280px)"></span>
<!--[if (lt IE 9) & (!IEMobile)]>
<span data-src="http://staticna1.lacoste.com/aaup_prd/on/demandware.static/-/Library-Sites-LacosteNAContent/default/dw873b74de/rich-menu/FW15/menu-rich-polos-banner.jpg"></span>
<![endif]-->
</span>

</div>

</div>

<div class="content-asset"><!-- dwMarker="content" dwContentID="deeVMiaaixbrUaaadnyRENKdcW" -->

<script type="text/javascript">
	var ___sb = $('aside.main-sidebar:eq(0)')[0];
	var ___li = ($(___sb) .children('ul').children('li:eq(3)'))[0];
	var ___elem = $(___li).children('ul').children('li:eq(0)')[0];
	var ___url = "http://www.lacoste.com/us/LeMagazine.html";
	$(___elem).removeAttr("data-accordion-menu-href").removeAttr("data-accordion-menu-group").addClass("not-accordion").html('<a href="'+___url+'">Le Magazine</a>');
	$(___elem).click(function()
	{
		console.log("Click");
		location.href = $(this).find('a').attr('href');
	});

	$(___elem).mouseover(function()
	{
		$('.dialog-menu-bg').trigger({ type:"mouseenter", pageX:"123", pageY:"123" });
	});
</script>

<a href="http://www.lacoste.com/us/lacoste_playground_landing.html" class="view-all">all latest articles</a>
<p class="sub-title-pl" style="width: 456px;margin: 20px auto;">Urban personalities, sport-inspired trends and timeless icons. Your seasonal guide on how to #livebeautifully</p>

<span class="title">the urbanites</span>
<span class="subtitle">#UrbanPaddle</span>
</span>
</a>
</div>
</div>
<div class="column-2-image-text mag-rich-menu">
<div class="column-half white-bg">
<a href="http://www.lacoste.com/us/playground-magazine/gift-ideas/">

            <div class="box-infos">
              <span style="visibility:hidden; display:none" itemprop="seller">Lacoste</span>                
		<h1 class="sku-product-name">
                  <span itemprop="name">High-top Ampthill sneakers</span>
                </h1>                
                		
		<div class="row clearfix box-infos share-rate">

			<span class="price-sales ">$50.00</span>
			
				<span itemprop="price" style="visibility:hidden; display:none">50.00</span>		
				<span itemprop="priceCurrency" style="visibility:hidden; display:none">USD</span>
			
		
		 
	
	
	
		
		
		
	

                    
                </div>
               
                
                	
 
	
		<div class="product-description sku-info-gray lower">
			<p class="sku-infos-title">Description</p>
			<p>
				High-top sneakers with classic, streamlined style and an iconic green crocodile on each side. The large toe gives little feet plenty of room to grow. Your child sports an athletic, urban look when pairing these sneakers with pants and a colorful sweater. 
			</p>
			<a href="#longdescription" class="link-lower readmore">Read more</a>
		</div>
	 

                
		
		<p class="product-reference sku-info-gray lower">
			COLOR :&nbsp<span
				id="selectedColor"></span>
		</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
	$(document).ready(function() {
		window.utag_data = {"page":{"pagename":"Sport_Kids_Shoes","pagecategory":"product","subcategory":"product details","sitecountrycode":"US","sitecountryname":"United States","language":"en_US","visitdate":"13/10/2015 08:00:58","nbpagesviewed":1,"visitlength":"00:00:00"},"user":{"usercountrycode":"UA","usercountryname":"Ukraine","loggedin":false,"usertype":"guest"},"cart":{},"product":{"productid":"30SPI3001","sku":"30SPI3001","productname":"High-top Ampthill sneakers","manufacturer":"DEVANLAY","description":"High-top sneakers with classic, streamlined style and an iconic green crocodile on each side. The large toe gives little feet plenty of room to grow. Your child sports an athletic, urban look when pairing these sneakers with pants and a colorful sweater. ","categoryid":"Sport_Kids","categoryname":"Kids","subcategory1":"Kids","subcategory2":"Shoes","productarea":"SPO","currency":"USD","unitprice":"50.00"},"recommandation":{"items":"temp"}};
		window.utag_data.recommandation.items=$('.tealium_tag_certona').text().slice(0,-1);
		
		if(typeof window.utag_data.product.color == 'undefined')
		{
			window.utag_data.product.color = $('#selectedColorCode').val();
		}
			
		if(typeof window.utag_data.product.stockavailability == 'undefined')
		{
			window.utag_data.product.stockavailability = $('#sizeavailability').val()+'%';
		}
			
		window.utag_data.page.pageurl = window.location.toString();
		if(condition="false")
		{
			if(window.utag && window.utag.view && typeof(window.utag.view) === 'function'){
				window.utag.view(window.utag_data);
			}
		}		
	});
</script>

			<h3 class="title-with-arrow"> Description</h3>
				<div class="product-infos-content-more form" itemprop="description">		
				<h3>High-top Ampthill sneakers</h3>
				 <span itemprop="productID">
				
					30SPI3001
				
				</span>
				
					<p>
						High-top sneakers with classic, streamlined style and an iconic green crocodile on each side. The large toe gives little feet plenty of room to grow. Your child sports an athletic, urban look when pairing these sneakers with pants and a colorful sweater. 
					</p>			
				
				
				<ul>
					
						<li>Clean uppers in classic colours</li>
					
											
						<li>Chunky vulcanised sole</li>
					
					
						<li>Iconic crocodile branding</li>
					
					
						<li>Contrast heel tab</li>
								
					
						<li>Tonal laces and eyelets</li>
								
								
				</ul>
			</div>

dware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/UPS-UPSPopinAjax","CANADAPOSTTRACKINGAJAX":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CanadaPost-PopinAjax","LOSTPASSWORD":"/us/forgotpassword","ACCOUNTSHOW":"/us/account","OLDACCOUNTMESSAGE":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/LoginUS-ShowMessage","INCLUDEGIFTCERTFORM":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/GiftCertV2-IncludeFormGiftCert","ADDPROXIMISADDRESS":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CartV2-AddProximisAddress","GETGEOPOPIN":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/Geolocation-GetSiteIPInfo","SHOWREMOVEPRODUCT":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CartV2-ShowRemoveProduct","REMOVEGIFTCERTFORM":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/GiftCertV2-ExcludeGiftCertificate","SAVESTOREID":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CartV2-SaveStoreId","GETBIRTHDAYPOPIN":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CheckoutV2-ShowBirthdayPopin","SAVEBIRTHDAYPOPIN":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/CheckoutV2-SaveBirthdayDateBillPay","CHECKPROXIMISMONDIALREAYADDRESS":"/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/COShippingV2-CheckMondialRelayProximisAddress"};

		Lacoste.product.bindProductPage();
	});
	Lacoste.product.toggleTile();
	Lacoste.product.bindTile();

<style>
    .footer-wrapper-inner ul.footer-follow-us a {
        display: inline-block !important;
        margin-right: 0;
        opacity: 0.5;
        margin: 0 0.5%;
    }
    .footer-wrapper-inner ul.footer-follow-us a:hover {
        opacity: 1;
    }
    .instagram-ico{

<script type="text/javascript">
	if(monetateData.setPageType == "unknown") {
		monetateData.trackUnknownPage = function() {
			window.monetateQ.push(["setPageType", monetateData.setPageType]);
			
			if(monetateData.addCartRows) window.monetateQ.push(["addCartRows", monetateData.addCartRows]);
			if(monetateData.breadCrumbs) window.monetateQ.push(["addBreadcrumbs", monetateData.breadCrumbs]);
	
			window.monetateQ.push(["trackData"]);
		};
		monetateData.trackUnknownPage();
	}
</script>
	




             



<script type="text/javascript">
	if(monetateData.setPageType == "unknown") {
		monetateData.trackUnknownPage = function() {
			window.monetateQ.push(["setPageType", monetateData.setPageType]);
			
			if(monetateData.addCartRows) window.monetateQ.push(["addCartRows", monetateData.addCartRows]);
			if(monetateData.breadCrumbs) window.monetateQ.push(["addBreadcrumbs", monetateData.breadCrumbs]);
	
			window.monetateQ.push(["trackData"]);
		};
		monetateData.trackUnknownPage();
	}
</script>







<div class="footer-logo">
<div class="img-footer-logo"></div>
</div>
</div>

        <a href=" https://plus.google.com/+Lacoste” rel="publisher"></a> 
        




<script type="text/javascript">
	function setCookie(sName, sValue, sDays) {
        var today = new Date(), expires = new Date();
        expires.setTime(today.getTime() + (sDays*24*60*60*1000));
        document.cookie = sName + "=" + encodeURIComponent(sValue) + ";expires=" + expires.toGMTString()+";path=/";
	}
	
	function getCookie(sName) {
        var cookContent = document.cookie, cookEnd, i, j;
        var sName = sName + "=";
 
        for (i=0, c=cookContent.length; i<c; i++) {
                j = i + sName.length;
                if (cookContent.substring(i, j) == sName) {
                        cookEnd = cookContent.indexOf(";", j);
                        if (cookEnd == -1) {
                                cookEnd = cookContent.length;
                        }
                        return decodeURIComponent(cookContent.substring(j, cookEnd));
                }
        }       
        return null;
	}
	
	jQuery(document).ready(function(){
		if(getCookie("cookieconsent") == null) {	
			jQuery('#cookie-policy button').bind('click', function(){
				setCookie("cookieconsent", "OK", 365);
				jQuery('#cookie-policy, .cookiepolicy-clear').hide();
			});
		}
	});
	
</script>
       	



	<script type="text/javascript">var utag_data = window.utag_data || {}</script>

	<!-- Loading script asynchronously -->
	<script type="text/javascript">
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    (function(a,b,c,d){
	    a='//tags.tiqcdn.com/utag/lacoste/usa/prod/utag.js';
	    b=document;c='script';d=b.createElement(c);d.src=a;d.type='text/java'+c;d.async=true;
	    a=b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0];a.parentNode.insertBefore(d,a);
	    })();
	});
	</script>	

       	
	<!-- Demandware Analytics code 1.0 -->
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://staticna1.lacoste.com/aaup_prd/on/demandware.static/Sites-FlagShip-Site/-/en_US/v1444405540518/internal/jscript/dwanalytics.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">//<!--
/* <![CDATA[ */
try{
  var trackingUrl = "http://www.lacoste.com/on/demandware.store/Sites-FlagShip-Site/en_US/__Analytics-Tracking";
  var dwAnalytics = dw.__dwAnalytics.getTracker(trackingUrl);
  if (typeof dw.ac == "undefined") { 
     dwAnalytics.trackPageView();
  } else {        
     dw.ac.setDWAnalytics(dwAnalytics);
  } 
}catch(err) {};
/* ]]> */
// -->
</script>
